item.title: When life puts you in tough situations don't say why me say try me
item.description: The phrase "When life puts you in tough situations, don't say why me; say try me" is often attributed to various sources and it has become a motivational and inspirational saying shared across different platforms, including social media, books and motivational talks. However, its exact origin is unclear and it's considered to be a popular quote rather than something attributed to
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
